titlestmt.titleproper: Rockefeller (Nelson A.) gubernatorial records, Office Subject Files, Series 37
A Guide to the Nelson A. Rockefeller gubernatorial records, Office Subject Files, Series 37 FA1602

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-03 00:27:05 -0400.

did.unittitle: Nelson A. Rockefeller gubernatorial records, Office Subject Files, Series 37

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: Series 37 is arranged in four subseries by gubernatorial administration.
Subseries 1: First Administration (FA439) Subseries 2: Second Administration (FA439A) Subseries 3: Third Administration (FA439B) Subseries 4: Fourth Administration (FA439C)

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Major subjects contained in the files include:

Administration. Aging. Agriculture. Authorities and Commissions. Banking. Civil Defense. Commemorative Observance. Conservation. Consumers. Correction. Disasters. Discrimination. Education. Executive Clemency. Extradition. Fiscal. Fund raising. Government. Health & Sanitation. Honorary Designation. Horse Racing. Housing. Insurance. Investigations. Invitations. Judiciary. Labor. Law. Legislation. Licensing. Mental Hygiene. Military and Naval. Organizations. Parks and Recreation facilities. Personnel Administration. Politics. Property. Public Safety. Public Utilities. Public Works. Regrets. Resignations and Vacancies. Statements. Transportation. Veterans. Welfare. Youth.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Microfilm user copies are available for research. The archival material has been reformatted. Access to the original paper records is restricted.
